2014 Conference 17th October 2014, Aberdeen

Sponsorship opportunities

In 2013 we welcomed just short of 100 people to the conference. This year we are moving to a bigger room, with more opportunities to feature sponsors on stage.

Every penny of the sponsorship raised will be used to help with conference costs, mainly venue costs, speaker expenses and catering for attendees.

We run a tight ship, and keep our costs to a minimum. Everyone involved in organising Northern Lights works on a voluntary basis. We work hard to keep individual ticket prices as low as we can to encourage the widest attendance possible. Tickets for Northern Lights 2014 are just £15 (£5 for students) including refreshments through the day and a great lunch.

Sponsors are essential to the continued success of Northern Lights, we’d be delighted to have you on board at any level. Please get in touch if you have any questions, we’d love to hear from you, and we hope to see you in October.

.Platinum Gold Supporter
